item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Tuesday, February 4, 2025 at 7:15 AM UTC
item.description:

3. OWASP Non-Human Identities Top 10 (16 points | 5 comments)

6. Httptap: View HTTP/HTTPS requests made by any Linux program (469 points | 112 comments)
7. The young, inexperienced engineers aiding DOGE (1233 points | 1933 comments)
8. El Salvador abandons Bitcoin as legal tender (708 points | 546 comments)

11. Resistance to Rust abstractions for DMA mapping (61 points | 31 comments)

14. ArXiv LaTeX Cleaner: Clean the LaTeX code of your paper to submit to ArXiv (45 points | 4 comments)

18. Ask HN: Who wants to be hired? (February 2025) (131 points | 309 comments)

24. What's Going on at the FBI? (47 points | 9 comments)

26. Show HN: I convert videos to printed flipbooks for living (388 points | 95 comments)
27. Beat the Drum (9 points | 2 comments)
28. Developer Philosophy (213 points | 50 comments)
29. Detroit’s revival takes shape after decades of decay (130 points | 143 comments)
30. The Cantonese Scrolls – A Cantonese language learning mental RPG (105 points | 39 comments)
